amendment.description: to modify the requirements for contingency program management to require only a Department of Defense plan for such management.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4200 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4200 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S5933-5937; text: CR S5933) to modify the requirements for contingency program management to require only a Department of Defense plan for such management.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4200 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4200 proposed by Senator Warner.
